item.title: Openssl
item.description: OpenSSL Documentation https://www.openssl.org/docs/man1.1.1/man1/openssl-rsa.html https://www.openssl.org/docs/man1.1.1/man1/openssl-req.html https://www.openssl.org/docs/man1.1.1/man5/x509v3_config.html https://www.openssl.org/docs/man1.1.1/man1/openssl-genpkey.html Private key PKCS#1 When using openssl genrsa command, the private key are in PKCS#1 format Example of unencrypted by openssl genrsa 2048 -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- ... -----END RSA PRIVATE KEY----- Example of encrypted by openssl genrsa -aes256 -passout pass:password 2048 -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- Proc-Type: 4,ENCRYPTED DEK-Info: AES-256-CBC,F8C9D9D84DC90042F39580997E1FECE6 ... -----END RSA PRIVATE KEY----- PKCS#8 When using openssl genpkey command, the private key are in PKCS#8 format
